ComicInfo.Summary:
Jughead has had a lot to deal with since going all "Full Moon". Betty Cooper werewolf hunter, Reggie Mantle werewolf pack... even a Frankenmoose. But has any of this prepared him for Vampironica? Or the horde or vampires that are invading his reality with her? Nope!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy, Bob Smith & Matt Herms | 1 | B | Cover B | Dan Panosian | 2 | C | Cover C | Darick Robertson & Kelly Fitzpatrick | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:36:13. [CVDB710743]

ComicInfo.Inker: Bob Smith, Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Ryan Jampole, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bob Smith, Dan Panosian, Darick Robertson, Kelly Fitzpatrick, Matt Herms, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Segura, Jamie Lee Rotante, Stephen Oswald, Vincent Lovallo
ComicInfo.Characters: Betty Cooper, Jughead Jones, Moose Mason, Reggie Mantle, Veronica Lodge
